description: Minimal number of coins needed to pay n Euro-cents using the Euro currency.
links: Index entries for sequences related to making change.
example: a(57) = 3 because to pay 57 cents at least 5 coins are needed: 1 of 50 cents, 1 of 5 cents and 1 of 2 cents.
author: Thomas Brendan Murphy (murphybt(AT)tcd.ie), Sep 06 2000
extensions: a(0)=0 prepended by _Alois P. Heinz_, May 26 2015
